text_block_list.text: Summer training camp is here! I want to train hard for the fall!
While hearing the determination of the Umamusume inside the bus, as expected—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: When happy, it goes boing boing boing! When surprised, it goes whoosh whoosh whoosh!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Why!? Turbo goes boing boing when happy and whoosh whoosh when surprised too!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: If you put it that way, maybe I'm like that too? In terms of nuance.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mufufu, good insight! So that means~?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ding ding dong! One point to Ikuno!
